examples.translation: What should I do if students keep talking back?

examples.chinese: 小孩頂嘴，大人立刻動怒，大人先輸一半！
examples.translation: When kids talk back and adults immediately get angry, the adults have already half lost!

examples.chinese: 為什麼跟你說什麼，你都要頂嘴呢？
examples.translation: Why do you have to talk back no matter what I say to you?
